attributes.action: Make it illegal for a dog to be tied up and left outside any retail outlet.
attributes.additional_details: People need to take more responsibility for their pets. The stress caused with losing them is heartbreaking so don't make it easy for the thieves.
attributes.background: People tethering their dogs outside shops/stores are making it easier to lose their family member.  Make this illegal to put a stop to it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552683.
